cli

Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • cli.NativeObject
      • cli.Element
        • cli.SyntaxNode
          • cli.Menu
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cli

    public abstract class Menu
extends SyntaxNode
    Menu class. A menu owns Element instances, which owns next Element instances... terminated by an Endl instance. Command lines are defined this way. When the shell analyzes a command line, it asks the corresponding menu to execute it through the abstract execute() method. The menu class also offers a handler to execute special operations when the menu exits.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Menu name access.
        Returns:
        Name of the menu.

      • populate

        public abstract void populate()
        Populate abstract method. This method should be overridden by final menu classes to describe the elements defining the command lines attached to the menu.

      • execute

        public abstract boolean execute(CommandLine CLI_CmdLine)
        Command line execution. This method should be overriden by final menu classes.
        Parameters:
        CLI_CmdLine - Command line to execute.
        Returns:
        true if the command line has been executed successfully (syntactically speaking), false otherwise.

      • onExit

        public void onExit()
        Handler called when the menu exits. This method may be overriden by final menu classes.

      • onPrompt

        public java.lang.String onPrompt()
        Handler called when then menu displays its prompt.
        Returns:
        The prompt to display. An empty string for the default prompt.
